short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the supply, delivery, installation (including training) of: (1) Digital PCR (dPCR) System for the Calgary Laboratory, Alberta.
description: The instrument is intended for the partitioned amplification and quantification of up to 4 target DNA sequences extracted from a variety of raw and processed food products. The instrument will be used for diagnostic microbiology and food fraud testing.

### Government Invitation to Tender
#### Invitation to Quote ITQ# 39903-230065: Digital PCR System

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3524171524-Doc3770313974
* **Invitation Issue Date**: 2022-12-01
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2022-12-22T14:00:00 EDT (Expired)
* **Estimated Contract Start Date**: 2023-01-10
* **Estimated Contract End Date**: 2023-01-31

### Technical Description and Requirements

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites suppliers to provide a Digital PCR (dPCR) System for the Calgary Laboratory in Alberta. The instrument shall be capable of partitioned amplification and quantification of up to 4 target DNA sequences extracted from various raw and processed food products.

### Location

The successful bidder will be required to deliver and install the system to the CFIA's Calgary Laboratory. Installation, including relevant training, is included in the scope of work.

### Tender Evaluation

The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price compliant with the requirements of this IFB.

### Supporting Documents

Bid submissions must include all required supporting documentation and be received by 2022-12-22 at 14:00 HAE.

### Contact

For further information, please contact Tanya Gostev, Government of Canada at [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
#### ### Invitation to Quote Documentation

For a comprehensive listing of the terms and conditions, please refer to the *CFIA Invitation to Quote ITQ # 39903-230065* and http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14765551.
